it.unibo.alchemist.model.interfaces

Interface TimeDistribution<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - concentration type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SAPERETimeDistribution
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDistribution, DiracComb, ExponentialTime, SAPEREExponentialTime, Trigger

    public interface TimeDistribution<T>
extends Cloneable, Serializable
    This interface represents a temporal distribution for any event.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TimeDistribution<T> clone() 
      ITime getNextOccurence() 
      double getRate() 
      void update(ITime curTime, boolean executed, double param, IEnvironment<T> env)
      Updates the internal status.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(ITime curTime,
            boolean executed,
            double param,
            IEnvironment<T> env)
        Updates the internal status.
        Parameters:
        curTime - current time
        executed - true if the reaction has just been executed
        param - a parameter passed by the reaction
        env - the current environment

      • getNextOccurence

        ITime getNextOccurence()
        Returns:
        the next time at which the event will occur

      • getRate

        double getRate()
        Returns:
        how many times per time unit the event will appen on average

      • clone

        TimeDistribution<T> clone()
        Returns:
        an exact copy of this TimeDistribution
